messages.subject: Census, and Pi day
messages.msgSnippet: We jumped on the pi day wagon...we thought it would be fun, and since my son is 4 ....we considered fraction...1/2 pie...1/4 pie....you get 1/8 of this
messages.messageBody:
We jumped on the pi day wagon...we thought it would be fun, and since my son is 4 ....we considered fraction...1/2 pie...1/4 pie....you get 1/8 of this pie....he helped make the pie crust, and we had blackberry, blueberry strawberry, rasberry, mint  pie, and we appreciate the wonderful, and fun idea!!!!Thanks. 
We got the short form for the census...names, and birthdates, and races.....SInce I am of the phylosophy....that I am a universal member of this place in space....We all chose to put Other race.....Human......I don't see what my race has to do with providing funding.  If we all put the same race, wouldn't we all get the same ammount?  there would still be the same ammount of people.  I've always written other when filling out applications, and the such...I just don't see the sense in asking this question , if your not going to give a self described answer, and their isn't the space for that.  I consider myself Other than a category, and so I choose Other.  Michelle
